name: Hop Hop! Donut (Demo)
description:
Donut the corgi had his owner kidnapped by an evil band of cats who envy the peace between humans and dogs, but luckily they aren't too bright. So, strap on your balloons with Donut and take to the skies, battling enemy critters in search of your beloved owner and find who is behind this nasty plot...

Controls

  • SPACE to hop/fly
  •  ARROW KEYS to move
  • ESC to pause

Developers:

Hop Hop! Donut was developed by Sam Feng and Jose Salas. We are student game designers from UCSC. If you like our game, please leave a comment or follow us on twitter. Thank you for your support!
